title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends accidentally discover a method of sending messages to the past, altering the flow of history and triggering a chain of events that could reshape the world.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humans fight for survival against giant humanoid Titans in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that grants the power to kill anyone by writing their name in it.

title: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song
description: An AI songstress must change history to prevent a future war between humans and AIs.
